articles.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 Remaster Pre-Order Guide: Bonuses, Collector's Edition, And More - GameSpot
articles.description: Remastered versions of the first two Tony Hawk's Pro Skater games are coming to PS4, Xbox One, and PC this September, and you can pre-order it now.
articles.content: The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series inspires more nostalgia than most games of its era. It's been five years since the last THPS game, and Pro Skater 5 was seriously underwhelming. Well, Activision has heard the calls from fans and is set to release a remastere… [+2953 chars]

articles.title: Intellivision taps Xbox veteran J Allard as global managing director - VentureBeat
articles.description: Intellivision Entertainment has hired Xbox veteran J Allard, one of the creators of Xbox Live, as its global managing director.
articles.content: Intellivision Entertainment has hired Xbox veteran J Allard as its global managing director. Allard will report to Intellivision CEO Tommy Tallarico, and he will take charge of a wide variety of operations that are critical in launching the companys retro gam… [+1193 chars]
